feed_content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><rss version="2.0"><channel><title>Apple Newsroom</title><link>https://www.apple.com/newsroom</link><description>Latest News from Apple</description><language>en-US</language><item><title>Apple Reports First Quarter Results</title><link>https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2024/01/apple-reports-first-quarter-results/</link><description>Apple today announced financial results for its fiscal 2024 first quarter ended December 30, 2023.</description><pubDate>Thu, 25 Jan 2024 13:30:00 PST</pubDate></item><item><title>Apple Vision Pro Available February 2</title><link>https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2024/01/apple-vision-pro-available-february-2/</link><description>Apple Vision Pro, Apple's revolutionary spatial computer, will be available beginning Friday, February 2.</description><pubDate>Wed, 24 Jan 2024 09:00:00 PST</pubDate></item></channel></rss>
test_content: Apple Inc. (AAPL) and Microsoft Corporation (MSFT) announced a new partnership today. The collaboration will focus on integrating Apple's hardware with Microsoft's cloud services. Google (GOOGL) and Amazon (AMZN) are also expected to participate in this initiative.

entries.title: Apple Reports First Quarter Results
entries.description: Apple today announced financial results for its fiscal 2024 first quarter ended December 30, 2023.
entries.content: Apple today announced financial results for its fiscal 2024 first quarter ended December 30, 2023. The Company posted quarterly revenue of $120 billion, up 15 percent year over year, and quarterly earnings per diluted share of $2.18, up 20 percent year over year.

entries.title: Apple Vision Pro Available February 2
entries.description: Apple Vision Pro, Apple's revolutionary spatial computer, will be available beginning Friday, February 2.
entries.content: Apple today announced Apple Vision Pro will be available beginning Friday, February 2, at all U.S. Apple Store locations and the U.S. Apple Store online. Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that transforms how people work, collaborate, connect, relive memories, and enjoy entertainment.
